description: Designed Perfectly for Space-saving which is unique and has an effective design. Perfect Life Ideas multipurpose refrigerator storage rack trays can be clamped on the refrigerator trays and other surfaces which is easily accessible to your food items when stored in a refrigerator such as cut fruits, vegetables, and other items in the racks. It can be retrieved with the help of the smart slide design. It brings a perfect Slide design, fridge freezer food storage shelf.Product Features:-* Environmental friendly material, non-toxic, and safe to use.* Ideal for home accessory to keep your kitchen clean and neat.* Hollow mesh design on the bottom allows for water drainage and ventilation.* Maximize fridge and freezer space for organizing food, drinks, vegetables* The retractable slider allows you to pull out the storage box and take things out conveniently.PRODUCT HIGHLIGHT:-This is a convenient storage organizer for your refrigerator or kitchen.It keeps your gadgets organized and your refrigerator neat.Smooth design, easy to place/remove items.It makes your refrigerator roomier and easier to store.Made of straw and It is non - toxic and wear-resistant.
